lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an article yesterday about talks in Bonn on Afghanistan's political future misstated the whereabouts of the president of Afghanistan's Northern Alliance, Burhanuddin Rabbani. His comments were made on television from the United Arab Emirates, not in Germany.
abstract: Correction of Nov 27 article: Afghanistan's Northern Alliance president Burhanuddin Rabbani spoke in United Arab Emirates, not Bonn
